issue.title: [CPP/Doc] Remove outdated Parquet documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4408](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4408). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Instructions documented in https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/doc/Parquet.md are not valid anymore.

comments.body:
